name: Custom Trivet
description:
This trivet is made using a multi-step transfer process on a ceramic tile. Trivets are aprox 6"x 6" square and finished with cork on the bottom for protection of your furniture.

Please allow 1-2 weeks for production. Please email ohhowcutecc@gmail.com if you need something faster. It is possible that your item may be in stock or rushed to meet your needs.

To clean: Use a mild detergent and a damp cloth and wipe clean

*************************
Custom orders:

- Upload image online (see below form) or send by email to ohhowcutecc@gmail.com. Once images have been uploaded don't forget to checkout and pay for your purchase online.

- A .pdf proof will be sent to you for you to approve. Once your proof has been approved your order will be started.

- When choosing your images remember that they will be cropped into a square. If your image has elements that you do not want cropped out (ie. faces on either side of the photo) you might want to look for another...

name: Custom Coasters - Choose your style!
description:
Choose from the following: * Absorbent Sandstone - $39.50 * Set of 4, Absorbent sandstone coasters that have a cork bottom and measure approximately 4" square. * Glossy Ceramic - $29.50 * Set of 4, Glossy ceramic coasters that have a cork bottom and measure approximately 4.25" square. * Flexible - $19.50 * Set of 4, Flexible coasters have a fabric top and rubber bottom. They measure approximately 4" square. (See second photo for examples.) Please note that photos may not come out exactly as pictured. When the image is transferred it might appear slightly different. Your coasters will ship within 1-2 weeks. Please email ohhowcutecc@gmail.com if you need something faster. ************************* Custom orders: - Upload up to 4 images online (see below form) or send by email to ohhowcutecc@gmail.com.
